title: League Friends linked website

embed.description: The official League of Legends chat app.

body:
On Android, on the "League Friends" App on Google PlayStore the linked
website "Visit Website" under Additional Information leads to the
official Korean website " http://www.leagueoflegends.co.kr/ " which is
a bit wierd, as I imagine it would make more sense for a company based
in NA to use " http://na.leagueoflegends.com/ " or at least any
English region like EU/EUW ect.

Not a huge problem, as it's fairly easy to switch regions just a small
thing I noticed.

replies.body: Well.  This is embarrassing.  As I added our localized store copy, I was also changing the localized website and privacy policy - but turns out that section doesn't change with each region!  Thanks for the catch, should be fixed shortly.
